dct_title_s: A plan of the city of New York : reduced from an actual survey
dct_description_sm: Shows streets and public buildings. "1763." "Lith. of H.R. Robinson for D.T. Valentine's Manual." "Copy from an original map in the possession of John F. Seaman, Esqr." Oriented with north to upper right corner. Includes index to points of interest.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York, N.Y. : Common Council, 1850] (N.Y. : H.R. Robinson)
